They're not even fussing about him."/pause 500/speak Nikolai "I'm glad they like me, I really love animals.$1"/pause 600/speak Marnie "It's really sweet of you to help out too, Nikolai.#$b#@ why don't you stay here with Nikolai while I go inside the barn to change their bales?$1"/pause 500/move Marnie 0 -2 0/warp Marnie 0 -1/pause 400/speak Nikolai "Why don't you try feeding her?"/pause 400/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer -1 0 3/playSound woodyStep/addObject 96 20 178/pause 300/playSound cow/pause 500/emote Nikolai 32/pause 400/speak Nikolai "She's such a good girl."/pause 600/stopAnimation Nikolai 4/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 600/playSound cow/pause 300/speak Nikolai "Take it easy, girl.$1"/pause 600/speak Nikolai "When I lived on the islands with my mom...#$b#I took care of all the stray cats in the neighborhood.#$b#They would always come to our porch and I would feed them.$1"/pause 400/speak Nikolai "I've been trying to get that one stray we saw at my place to trust me."/pause 300/speak Nikolai "But he keeps running away.$2"/pause 400/speak Nikolai "I'd love to be friends with the little guy.$1"/pause 600/speak Nikolai "$q 999999 null# Do you love animals?.#$r -1 50 nik_animals_1#I love animals, I want plenty on my farm.#$r -1 -50 nik_animals_2# I've never liked animals.
